thread.title: Wynn Las Vegas and Encore Announce a Selection of Luxury Suites Available to Guests for the First Time
thread.title_full: Wynn Las Vegas and Encore Announce a Selection of Luxury Suites Available to Guests for the First Time - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Wynn Las Vegas and Encore Announce a Selection of Luxury Suites Available to Guests for the First Time
text:
Wynn Las Vegas
LAS VEGAS , Sept. 9, Wynn Las Vegas and Encore today announced that the resorts' exquisite apartments and villas are available for rent. The Wynn Fairway Villas and Encore Three Bedroom Duplex include a variety of amenities to enhance the guest experience.
Experience the interactive Multimedia News Release here: http://www.multivu.com/players/English/7609051-wynn-las-vegas-encore-luxury-suites/
The 5,829 square-foot Encore Three Bedroom Duplex features a billiard room and private massage and exercise room surrounded by floor-to-ceiling views of Las Vegas . The duplex is anchored by a grand living room and dining area, which highlight a two-story cityscape and can comfortably seat sixteen guests. Along with a private bedroom, the first floor offers a formal dining table, work space, wet bar, separate powder room, butler's pantry with refrigerator, and elevator to the second floor.
Each of the three lavish bedrooms has a pop-up 42" LCD HDTV, seating area, and private baths with separate glass-enclosed rain shower, whirlpool deep-soak tub, twin sinks and spacious closets. Guests booking the Three Bedroom Duplex will enjoy butler service, a daily cabana at the exclusive Tower Suite pool, daily access to The Spa and fitness center, priority reservations the Wynn Golf Course, restaurants, spas and salons, expedited nightclub entry, limo service to and from the airport, and complimentary in-room high speed internet access.
The Wynn Fairway Villas offer private views of the Wynn Golf Course that is best enjoyed from the private balconies that are equipped for outdoor dining. Guests can relax in the private massage room, or the spacious living room with seating for eight featuring a 52" LCD HDTV and a separate powder room. Fairway Villas include a work space, complimentary in-room high speed internet access, and a breakfast nook with a mahogany and granite wet bar.
Offered in one or two bedroom configurations, each villa has two pristine marble bathrooms with rain shower and infinity-edged bathtub, connecting from the master bedroom. Arrival begins with an exclusive private-drive entrance and registration lobby, personal ambassador, and is topped each morning with complimentary coffee and tea service. Included in the stay, guests will enjoy butler service, daily access to The Spa and fitness center, priority reservations at the Wynn Golf Course , restaurants, spas and salons, expedited nightclub entry, limo service to and from the airport, and complimentary in-room high speed internet access.
Rates and availability are available upon request. Suites may be reserved by calling 702-770-7077. For more information about included amenities and floorplans, guests may visit www.wynnlasvegas.com .
ABOUT WYNN LAS VEGAS
Wynn and Encore Las Vegas are two luxury hotel and casino resorts on the Las Vegas Strip. The iconic travel destinations are operated by international resort developer Wynn Resorts (NASDAQ: WYNN), recipient of more Forbes Travel Guide Five Star Awards than any other independent hotel company in the world. Wynn Las Vegas opened on April 28, 2005 and has been recognized as the best resort in Nevada on Conde Nast Traveler's "Gold List" for six consecutive years. The resort features 2,714 lavish guest rooms and suites, more than 111,000 square feet of state-of-the-art casino space, 14 casual and fine dining restaurants , a spa and salon and an on-site Ferrari and Maserati dealership and 18-hole golf course . Wynn Las Vegas is home to Le Reve â€“ The Dream , the aquatic and aerial theatrical experience named Best Show in Las Vegas for four consecutive years, and Steve Wynn's ShowStoppers , a production with 35 singers and dancers and a full 31-piece on-stage orchestra composed of quintessential numbers from some of the most celebrated composers and lyricists to ever grace American theater stages. Encore, an expansion of Wynn Las Vegas, opened on Dec. 22, 2008 . Featuring an additional 2,034 all-suite accommodations, a 72,000-square-foot casino, five restaurants and a spa and salon, Encore is located adjacent to Wynn Las Vegas. Combined, the two resorts boast four distinct nightlife and day club experiences, approximately 283,000 square feet of meeting space and 98,000 square feet of retail space. For more information on Wynn and Encore Las Vegas, visit www.wynnpressroom.com , follow on Twitter and Instagram at @WynnLasVegas and www.facebook.com/wynnlasvegas .
